summary: An artificially intelligent PC and his human owner find themselves in a romantic rivalry over a woman.

Dog|Gina Francis|Ruth Westheimer|Frazer Smith|Chuck Abernathy|Oliver Barron|Giorgio Moroder
title: Sueños eléctricos
